nodes.name: nodes
nodes.prompt: Total number of nodes (if high-availability is disabled, must be a multiple of 2)

ebs_storage_size.name: ebs_storage_size
ebs_storage_size.prompt: Storage capacity (GiB) per node, minimum of 10 and maximum of 2048

ultra_warm_data_nodes.name: ultra_warm_data_nodes
ultra_warm_data_nodes.prompt: Enter number of UltraWarm warm data nodes, minimum of 2 and maximum of 150

storage_capacity.name: storage_capacity
storage_capacity.prompt: Storage capacity (GiB), minimum of 32 and maximum of 65536

iops.name: iops
iops.prompt: Total provisioned IOPs (MiB/s), minimum of 3000 and maximum of 16000

throughput.name: throughput
throughput.prompt: Total provisioned throughput (MiB/s), minimum of 8 and maximum of 2048; Throughput to IOPS ratio should not exceded 1:4

dedicated_master_nodes_enabled.name: dedicated_master_nodes_enabled
dedicated_master_nodes_enabled.prompt: Enable the use of dedicated master nodes [yes|no]

dedicated_master_nodes.name: dedicated_master_nodes
dedicated_master_nodes.prompt: Enter number of dedicated master nodes (3 or 5)

dedicated_master_node_type.name: dedicated_master_node_type
dedicated_master_node_type.prompt: Enter dedicated master node instance type [medium|large]

subnet_ids.name: subnet_ids
subnet_ids.prompt: A comma-separated list of subnet IDs for the group

security_group_ids.name: security_group_ids
security_group_ids.prompt: Comma-Separated list of security groups to associate
